fields.summary: iOS7: Update SDK to support building/running apps for iOS 7

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Feature Request for the following:

- Tint Color property for all applicable UIKit Elements. If natively present in Ti, it reduces the dependancy on external modules, given that the tint color has become the most widely used property in iOS7 for UI Elements.

- Simple MACRO so developers can detect if the OS>=7. If lesser, they can adapt the UI accordingly to be suitable for previous OS UI Guidelines.

- UICollectionView: This has been long due. Over a year now. A separate module or natively available under Ti.UI.iPhone or similar.

- UIKit Dynamics (Low Priority)

- TextKit (Medium Priority)

comments.body: Thank you for filing this ticket. In the future, it's much easier if you file a separate ticket for each request. I've marked this as a duplicate of the linked tickets. Please follow along there.
Closing ticket as duplicate as the relevant ticket is linked above.
